## extractProof() function

extracts core claim from Proof and returns Proof Type


**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function extractProof(proof: object): {
    claim: Claim;
    proofType: ProofType;
};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  proof | object | proof of vc |

**Returns:**

{ claim: Claim; proofType: [ProofType](./polygonid-js-sdk.prooftype.md); }

{\*} {{ claim: Claim; proofType: ProofType }}
